seo.title: About Us - CeroCloud POS
seo.description: Learn about the mission, philosophy, and team behind CeroCloud. 100% local, secure, and open-source business management.
seo.og_description: We are democratizing local business management. 100% offline and Open Source software.

hero.subtitle: No subscriptions. No cloud. Just powerful software for your business.

privacy.title: Data Sovereignty
privacy.description: We believe your business data belongs to you. Not to us, not to the cloud. That's why CeroCloud works 100% offline.

cost.title: Zero Recurring Costs
cost.description: Business software shouldn't bleed your budget. Once downloaded, it's yours forever.

about.mission: Empowering local businesses with technology that respects their privacy and independence.
about.footer_love: Made with love for local businesses

seo.title: Contribute to CeroCloud - Open Source POS
seo.description: Help us build the best open-source local POS. Contribute code, report bugs, or translate CeroCloud.
seo.og_title: Contribute to CeroCloud - Open Source Revolution
seo.og_description: Your help matters. Join us to build the best free POS software.

hero.title: Join the Revolution
hero.subtitle: CeroCloud is open source. Your code, ideas, and feedback shape the future of local business software.

bugs.title: Report Bugs
bugs.description: Found a glitch? Let us know so we can fix it for everyone.

code.title: Write Code
code.description: Grab an issue, fork the repo, and submit a PR. We love contributors!

discuss.title: Join Discussions
discuss.description: Share ideas for new features or ask questions in our community.

spread.title: Spread the Word
spread.description: Star the repo and tell others about CeroCloud.

step1.title: Fork & Clone
step1.description: Fork the repository to your GitHub account and clone it locally.

step2.title: Branch Out
step2.description: Create a new branch for your feature or fix (e.g., feat/new-report).

step3.title: Commit & Push
step3.description: Commit your changes with clear messages and push to your fork.

step4.title: Pull Request
step4.description: Open a PR against our main branch. We'll review and merge!

thanks.title: Thank You!
thanks.description: Every contribution helps small businesses around the world.
